lead_paragraph: Residents of Sag Harbor’s African-American neighborhoods on Long Island worry that an influx of investors who are sweeping up properties will forever alter the community’s character.

headline.print_headline: Black Enclave’s Newcomers: Mr. and Mrs. L.L.C.
headline.main: Investors Move Next Door, Unsettling a Black Beachside Enclave

snippet: Residents of Sag Harbor’s African-American neighborhoods on Long Island worry that an influx of investors who are sweeping up properties will forever alter the community’s character....
abstract: Soaring housing prices in Long Island's Hamptons have sparked investor interest in properties in communities like Sag Harbor Hills, which have historically been African-American communities; long-time residents complain that buying up of properties by investors is altering feel of such enclaves in area.
